oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portrait photographs; People; Men; Military personnel; Soldiers; Uniforms; Military uniforms
United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Tennessee - History - Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bust portrait of Adelbert A. Carrier in Federal uniform. An inscription on the back reads, "Yours Truly Adelbert A. Carrier, Liberty, Sullivan Co., N. Y."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Morse's Gallery of the Cumberland
